name: Baila Latino
description:
A fun dance game for all your family and friends!
Latin American music is suitable for all ages, and makes children and adults dance, creating an atmosphere of great amusement in front of the TV.
There are 20 hit songs to choose from, and the game's choreography has been created by professional dancers, Carlo Romano and Vera Sokolova from the “Carolyn Smith Dance Academy”.
You can play alone or with friends, up to four players at the same time.
The lyrics of the song will appear on the TV screen so while you are dancing, others can sing!
